description:
We had just purchased some new gym equipment and the guys were anxious to try it out.
Trent was standing there with Trevor, looking at the new abdominal station — you know, the kind where you hold onto the handles and kick your legs up into the air.
"I think it would be cool to get my ass eaten on that," Trent said.
We had told him about rimming earlier and he was more than curious.
"Yeah," I said to Trevor. "You could really get up under there!"
The guys had a lot of fun with their new toy — it really let them do some pretty hot positions!
title: Trevor & Trent
